settings.title: Professional Power Tools for Folkestone Tradespeople
settings.paragraph_1: Folkestone's Creative Quarter regeneration, the Harbour Arm development and the ongoing transformation of the town's Victorian terraces have turned the area into one of Kent's most active building markets. Invicta Tools at our Canterbury branch is 25 minutes up the A260/M20 — a genuine trade counter where you can browse, handle tools and get expert advice face-to-face.
settings.paragraph_2: The variety of work in Folkestone — from seafront commercial conversions to residential renovations in the Leas clifftop area — demands a broad, professional toolkit. We carry the complete Makita 18V LXT and 40V XGT ranges alongside DeWalt's 18V XR and FlexVolt systems. Impact drivers, combi drills, circular saws, SDS hammers, grinders, sanders, routers — all available with genuine warranties through our authorised dealership.
settings.paragraph_3: For Folkestone tradespeople who'd rather not make the drive, we offer free delivery on orders over £30 to all CT18–CT20 postcodes. Order online or phone our trade team on 01843 210 459 — we'll sort your order the same day where stock allows.

settings.title: Need Tools in Folkestone?
settings.subtitle: Call our Canterbury branch for expert advice, or shop online with free delivery over £30.
